title: Assault on 2 tribal men in Gujarat’s Narmada leaves 1 dead, 1 critical; 6 held
selftext: 2 tribal men were killed on the pretext of theft and entering the new under-construction Tribal Museum in Narmada, Gujarat. The one in critical condition died today.
